projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
[~manuellehner] just told me GitHub's support helped him to convert https://github.com/manumaticx/Ti.DrawerLayout from a fork of https://github.com/Tripvi/Ti.DrawerLayout into a source.

We should ask the same for https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.facebook which is now listed as a fork of https://github.com/mokesmokes/titanium-android-facebook.

Forks are not indexed by GitHub, which makes them indiscoverable, for example by gitTio.
fields.summary: Facebook: Ask GitHub to convert repository from fork to source
